welcome.title: Southern Savo Green and Digital Transition Dashboard
welcome.lead: We are building public sector innovation capacity towards digital-driven NPA communities
welcome.description:
This dashboard visualizes the green and digital transition indicators for the Southern Savo region.

The indicators help monitor and understand the progress of municipalities in their journey towards sustainable and digital future.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Manage your cookie and privacy preferences.

about.title: About
about.lead: Learn how to use the platform and understand the indicators
about.description: The dashboard provides an interactive way to explore and compare different indicators across municipalities in the Southern Savo region.

navigation.title: Basic Navigation
items: Click on municipalities to see detailed information
Use the side navigation to switch between different indicator categories
Explore the map to understand regional patterns

indicators.title: Working with Indicators
items: Select an indicator to view it on the map
Pin an indicator to compare it with another

ai.title: AI Assistant
items: An AI assistant is available to help answer your questions
Please note that the assistant is in development phase and may have limited knowledge

modal.title: Privacy Settings
modal.description: This website uses cookies to analyze our traffic and improve user experience.

usage.title: How we use cookies
usage.description: We use cookies to ensure basic functionality and analyze our traffic with anonymized data.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website. All data is anonymized.
